about_the_game:
This pack contains all 8 Operators from Year 1 (Frost, Buck, Valkyrie, Blackbeard, Caveira, Capitão, Hibana and Echo).

Discover new ways to fight your opponents with these 8 additional operators. Create new strategies and tactics with their unique gadgets.
detailed_description:
This pack contains all 8 Operators from Year 1 (Frost, Buck, Valkyrie, Blackbeard, Caveira, Capitão, Hibana and Echo).

Discover new ways to fight your opponents with these 8 additional operators. Create new strategies and tactics with their unique gadgets.
